medical_history.chief_complaint: Right lower quadrant pain with bloating.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was previously well until last night, when she developed bloating and right lower quadrant (RLQ) pain. She describes a constant, sharp pain that radiates to her back. The pain has persisted but has not worsened over the past few days. She denies any nausea or vomiting until today during the ambulance ride and reports low-grade fevers at home.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), osteopenia, depression, total abdominal hysterectomy (TAH), bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy (BSO).
medical_history.family_history: Mother had breast cancer, father had heart disease, sister in good health.
